item.title: Research
item.description: On Machine Learning DoS Attack Identification from Cloud Computing Telemetry (2019). Joao H. Correa, Patrick Marques Ciarelli, Moises R. N. Riberio, Rodolfo da Silva Villaca - LANCOMM Student Workshop (Latin American Student Workshop on Data Communication Networks), 2019, Gramado - RS Dispositivos conectados a serviço web em nuvem: complementariedade entre infraestrutura e seletividade para proteção contra DDoS. (2018). Joao H. Correa, Epaminondas Sousa Junior, Pablo dos Santos, Vivek Nigam, Iguatemi E.

item.title: Render LaTeX using KaTeX
item.description: Enable katex by adding katex = "true" to the front matter +++ katex = "true" +++ It’s almost a dropin alternative to the mathjax solution,you should just choose one of them. Inline math looks like this This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$ This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1$ and with math blocks: $$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$$ $$ \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 $$

item.title: About Joao
item.description: Education Ph.D. in Computer Science - Computer Networks Federal University of Espírito Santo - Vitória, ES, Brazil 2017 - Present M.Sc. in Computer Science - Computer Networks Federal University of Paraíba - João Pessoa, PB, Brazil 2015 - 2017 Graduated in Computer Networks Federal Institute of Education, Science and Technology of Paraíba - João Pessoa, PB, Brazil 2012 - 2015 Professional and Academic Experience Researcher/Ph.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects vCPE - Network equipment virtualization Development of a vCPE (Virtual Customer Premises Equipment) prototype using the OpenStack platform as a cloud resource manager.
